node.title: Clover Moore on track to be 'comfortably' re-elected as Sydney Lord Mayor, despite early swing against her
node.alt: a woman looking to the side talking
node.description: Clover Moore is on track to extend her 17-year reign at the helm of the City of Sydney as the vote counting continues.
node.content:
["Clover Moore\u00a0is set to extend her 17-year reign as Lord Mayor of the City of Sydney,\u00a0despite\u00a0signs of an\u00a0early swing against her in council election vote counts.", "The city's longest-serving lord mayor\u00a0addressed her supporters in Darlinghurst just after 9:00pm to claim victory.", "Alex Greenwich, the independent state MP for Sydney, told the crowd vote tallies showed Cr Moore would\u00a0\"be comfortably re-elected as the Lord Mayor of Sydney\".", "In her speech, Cr Moore said her retaining of the role meant her \"strong, independent, progressive leadership of the city\" would continue.", "At\u00a09.30pm, Cr Moore had attracted 42.9\u00a0per cent of the more than 27,000 formal votes \u2014 about\u00a015\u00a0per cent of all eligible voters \u2014\u00a0so far counted.", "At the 2016\u00a0election, Cr Moore garnered 58 per cent of the vote.", "ABC election analyst Antony Green said it was still too early to say how the swing would hold up as more votes, including a large number of\u00a0pre-poll ballots,\u00a0are counted.", "", "
Independent Lord Mayor candidate Yvonne Weldon.(Supplied)
", "Labor candidate Linda Scott and the city's first Indigenous mayoral candidate, Yvonne Weldon, were neck-and-neck having each\u00a0received 16.4\u00a0per cent of the vote at 9:30pm.", "Local government elections were held in 124 council areas on Saturday, with residents in 35 localities also tasked with choosing a new mayor.", "Polls closed at 6pm with results now beginning to show a clearer picture of who the new local leaders will be.", "More people opted to vote online than in any previous election, with the NSW Electoral Commission's iVote site crashing on Saturday morning.", "In Hornsby, former federal MP Phillip Ruddock was also on track to be re-elected as Mayor.", "The state president of the NSW Liberal Party enjoyed more than 56 per cent of the vote with 41 per cent of all votes\u00a0counted.", "In Sydney's south-west\u00a0a tight race for mayor was unfolding\u00a0between Liberal Ned Mannoun (42.6 per cent) and Labor's Hagarty (37.8 per cent).", "Labor candidates had received more than 53 per cent of the votes in the Blacktown local government area, while in Parramatta the Labor Party had gained more than 40 per cent of votes.", "Earlier on Saturday, the NSW Electoral Commission's\u00a0online voting system iVote crashed.", "Eligibility to vote online was expanded this year with more than twice as many voters choosing to\u00a0register instead of braving\u00a0the queues on election day.", "The number of online votes rose to 652,983 since the system opened on November 22, up from 234,401 in 2019.", "", "
Residents in 35 councils had to vote directly for mayor.(ABC News)
", "In apologising for the outage, iVote said in a statement: \"Almost triple the number of voters have used iVote at these elections than any previous election.\"", "Anyone who requested\u00a0for iVote but were\u00a0unable to cast their ballots due to Saturday's crash\u00a0will be excused from penalties.", "People who failed to vote face a fine of at least $55.", "Counters will not begin tallying online votes\u00a0until 6pm on Monday."]
